title: Robust and Secure Transmission for Movable-RIS Assisted ISAC with Imperfect Sense Estimation
summary: Reconfigurable intelligent surfaces (RISs) have been extensively applied in integrated sensing and communication (ISAC) systems due to the capability of enhancing physical layer security (PLS). However, conventional static RIS architectures lack the flexibility required for adaptive beam control in multi-user and multifunctional scenarios.
